summary: Memorandum regarding a meeting between the Chief of CI and Mr. Paul Wallach, Chief Counsel of the Senate Select Committee on Intelligence, concerning access to Agency files related to the Lee Harvey Oswald case. The meeting addressed concerns about the Agency's cooperation and the sanitization of sensitive information. An agreement was reached for Senate Committee reviewers to work with the original files, with certain sensitive items sterilized or summarized, subject to spot checks. The agreement was approved by Mr. Blee.
title: Chief, CI Meeting with Mr. Paul Wallach, Chief Counsel of Senate Select Committee on Intelligence
sender: Robert G. Wall, Deputy Chief, CI/OG
